title: Chip Pum Pum
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, Assanté brings Apple TV’s newest hit show - Severance - to the hot button segment. If your employer offered a tech hack that would allow you to go “unconscious” during work hours, so you could get through it with minimal stress and “sever” your work life from your home life, would you accept? We share our thoughts and experiences. 

Black Business of the Week - https://www.instagram.com/launchreading

Wellness Segment - Aveda Botanical Repair https://www.aveda.com/botanical-repair-hair-damage-treatment?gclid=Cj0KCQjwxtSSBhDYARIsAEn0thRgZMMwk_SgxAiPHaOgTRTqRRPUMALcXMmcCkb-0e4mr9rZxfFnO0IaAvViEALw_wcB&gclsrc=aw.ds

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio AND video) plus our MONTHLY Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Minnesota Public Radio - Join Grace, Amy and their exciting guests for something we all need - a show that focuses on joy. Follow The Antidote wherever you get your podcasts. 

HelloFresh - Go to https://www.HelloFresh.com/friendzone16 and use code friendzone16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts.  

Thuma - Create that feeling of checking in to your favorite boutique hotel suite, but at home, with The Bed, by Thuma. And go to https://www.thuma.co/friend and use the code FRIEND to receive a twenty-five dollar credit towards your purchase of The Bed plus free shipping in the continental U.S. 

 Follow us online:
 Twitter - www.twitter.com/friendzonepod 
Facebook - www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast 
Patreon - www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast
 Discord - discord.gg/Jee2cwfAdz

Have a GREAT day!
